derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin tamariscus, variant of Latin tamarix, of unknown origin

entry.tran: （多见于地中海和亚洲的）柽柳
entry.def: A tamarisk is a bush or small tree which grows mainly around the Mediterranean and in Asia, and has pink or white flowers.

means.word_mean: 1. any shrub or small tree of the genus Tamarix having small scalelike or needle-shaped leaves and feathery racemes of small white or pinkish flowers; of mostly coastal areas with saline soil
